amendment.description: Amendment provides for the Speaker of the House and Senate Majority Leader to appoint members to congressionally created advisory boards.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 6 printed in part A of House Report 114-120 to provide for the Speaker of the House and Senate Majority Leader to appoint members to congressionally created advisory boards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 183 (Roll no. 253).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Griffith amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 183 (Roll no. 253).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Griffith.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
